SENSATIONAL.Definition: very exciting or shocking in a way that gets attention

CONTROVERSIAL.Definition: causing people to argue or have different strong opinions

SAW THE LIGHT.Definition: realised something important or true about their beliefs

EVANGELICAL.Definition: related to a type of Christian who shared their faith strongly

SOUNDLY.Definition: in a strong and clear way

BY THE LETTER OF THE LAW.Definition: exactly by what the law says

AGENTS.Definition: people who worked to do something for

VIGOROUSLY.Definition: with lots of energy and force

THE TABLES HAD TURNED.Definition: the situation was now the opposite of before
